timeline.message: #17994 : As of many versions ago, pushing an archived content would make dotCMS delete it altogether in the receiving instance, which is incorrect. This change allows the Push Publishing feature and the Push Now actionlet the flexibility to push an archived content to the receiver for: (1) Simply flagging it as Archived, or (2) to delete it completely.

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid catching generic exceptions such as NullPointerException, RuntimeException, Exception in try-catch block
